item.title: CogVideoX:A Cutting-Edge Video Generation Models

item.title: GLM Long: Scaling Pre-trained Model Contexts to Millions
item.description: In early 2023, even the most advanced GPT-3.5 had a context length of only 2k. However, today, a context length of 1M has become one of the important indicators for measuring the technological advancement of models. If LLM is compared to the operating system of the new era, the context window is its “memory”. A modern operating system requires sufficient memory to complete various complex tasks. Similarly, an excellent LLM also requires sufficient context length to complete various complex tasks.
